#######Shapefiles

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(sf)
canDB <- st_read("../Visualizations/census2016_DBS_shp/ldb_000b16a_e.shp", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
                 #ldb_000b16a_e/ldb_000b16a_e.shp")
DB_Van_CMA <- canDB %>% filter(CMANAME == "Vancouver")
st_write(DB_Van_CMA,"../Visualizations/census2016_DBS_shp/DB_Van_CMA", driver = "ESRI Shapefile")
```
